title: A Boy of the Netherlands
brief_description: The experiences of a Dutch farm boy when he travels by cargo barge to Amsterdam along the canals of Holland. He learns about life on board ship; and something of the industries of his country. The highlight of his visit to Amsterdam is a tour of city shops. Suitable for middle and upper primary and lower secondary levels.
